Key.Original: Unload Vehicle Cargo to Ammobox
<t color='#f59900' size='.45' align='center'>Warning! You lack the proficiency to effectively operate this weapon.</t>

Automatic Commander Switching
In regular intervals, the highest ranking player will be assigned the role of Commander.
Only players on the members list are eligible to become Commander, can access the arsenal inventory and have their rank saved.
Continue your previous campaign or start a fresh one.
Easier conditions include more starting funds and additional gear available from the start.

Please adjust the campaign settings.
Press 'Start Mission' to continue.

Funky ACE info here.
More funky ACE info.
Funky town.

More funky AFRF info.
Funky town.

More funky USAF info.

Your guerilla movement fights against USAF/USMC.
Russian VDV forces will assist you.

Funky town.
Select Camp or HQ when no enemies nearby
Look like a civilian and be ignored by enemies, don't get revealed!
Make your group benefit of Antistasi features
Give money to FIA or to your mates

Temporarily take control of selected AI.
Disabled when ACE is active.
AI will take care of their wounds and also other mates ones
AI actively scavenge what they need according to their class
Dismisses currently selected AI or group.
Have currently selected units store their gear. Point at vehicle to use for storage.
If AI gets stuck in an activity...
Store the vehicle you are looking at and its inventory.
Sell the vehicle you are looking at.
Donate 100€ to the player you're looking at.
Support the cause by donating some of your illegally acquired currency.
Recruit squads to support your effort, including fireteams and mounted units.
Supply squads with vehicles, check their current state.
Setup or take down camps, roadblocks and watchposts.
Display additional details about the current state of your forces (arms, vehicles, etc).
Price: 20 Points -- Air cavalry will assault the target location.
Price: 20 Points -- Armoured cavalry will assault the target location.
Price: 10 Points -- A deployed battery will be at your command at a base of your choice.
Price: 10 Points -- Mounted units will depart to the chosen location and setup a roadblock.
Price: 10 Points -- An armed UAV will be placed under your command.
Price: 5 Points -- A basic resupply kit will be para-dropped at the chosen location.
Price: 10 Points -- A Vic formation of CAS aircraft will be placed under your command.
Price: 10 Points -- A bomb run will be performed along the specified vector.
Price: 10 Points -- A QRF will be dispatched from the chosen base/airport.
Price: 100 Points -- Weaken the enemy supporting faction by 10 points
HR=8 money=950 - 8 man squad + optional truck which costs 200
HR=4 money=450 - 4 man team + optional truck wbich costs 200
HR=4 money=550 - 4 man with 2 AT + optional offroad which costs 200
HR=3 money=1350 - A truck with a static AA attatched
HR=2 money=300 - 2 man, one sniper and a spotter + optional quadbike which cost 50
HR= money=1300 - A truck with a static AT attatched, might benefit of AI management section "Static Autotarget"
HR=2 money=1300 A truck with a mortar attatched, give it time to deploy then shift+ctrl+Y to bombard
HR=1 money=500 - A repair offroad which works as repairstation overtime, the engineer can also remove minefields
Look to the vehicle you want to assign to selected team
Ask status informations about squad assigned vehicle
Order squad to mount or dismount their assigned vehicle if they have one
Static gun attatched to vehicles can benefit by rotating for a better target acquisition
Roadblock are effective against ground vehicle and some aircraft, if selecting outside roads build an Observation Post
Get HR refounded back if units are still operational
Dangerous, it require mines in the arsenal, not tested yet with RHS and JAS
Dangerous, it require mines in the arsenal, not tested yet with RHS and JAS
Spawn a truck with 2 man crew, only the driver has to arrive in selected area to build
Possibility to change name for easier communications with the team
Add objects to make HQ look better, watch out collision with spawning vehicles
Display limitations according to FIA Army XP Level
Check your progress and what's missing to upgrade to next Level
Delete on ground items, corpses, destroyed vehicle. Might freeze a bit
Terminate Petros' animation, move him next to the campfire at HQ.
Reinitialize your ability to move statics and HQ assets.
If you managed to lose one of your HQ items, this will reset all of them near Petros.
Toggle player names displayed on map
Look at a player, Members are eligible to be commander and can recruit AI
Look at a player to remove him from the member list
No longer required/working, JAS is bulletproof.
If disabled there won't be any gated progression nor the benefit like enhanced roadblocks
Fastravel to all friendly locations, roadblocks included
Clear Garbage, might freeze a bit
When enabled, weapons have increased sway if not belonging to your class
add test functions, usage in normal campaign will have bad and evident effects
The script is not optimized for Join in Progress, not all the player might retain the effect.
Our Spies have reported that a CSAT officer is inspecting %1. Now is the time to Strike! Make sure he is eliminated by any means possible before %2:%3.

Reports have come in that a CSAT SpecOps ground team is currently patrolling near %1. From what we know, these are tough soldiers who usually make use of airial un-manned drones. A well executed strike will gain us some of their high tech equipment. Do this before %2:%3.

Bad news, one of our very own is planning to defect. We have tracked his movements to the nearby town of %1. We are not taking any chancs. Kill him before he provides the enemy with intel of the location of our soldiers homes and FIA cash stockpiles. Do this before %2:%3. We don't where exactly this meeting will happen. You will recognise the building by the nearby MRAP and CSAT presence.
The mayor of %1 is having a meeting with an enemy representetive, this is our chance to kidnap him and take him to our HQ for a much needed chat. The mayor must not die! Do this before %2:%3.

CSAT knows the location of our HQ. We suspect that they have sent a SpecOps Air Squad in order to kill Petros. We have two choices - Either retreat and move HQ further than 1km away, or defend with all we have.

A CSAT %1 is disturbing our operations in the area. This heavily defended outpost has Mortar and UAV, from what our spies tell us. We advise the destruction of the Drone before engaging and elimination the majority of ground troops. If there is an AA tank, this is also a priorty target. The operation must be completed before %2:%3.

A %1 has a monopoly over the power supply to nearby towns. Nato might not like this, but we have no choice- We need the Towns on our side and to achieve this we will need the Powerplant. Capture it before %2:%3.
A %1 is disturbing our operations in the area. Go there and capture it before %2:%3.

A convoy from %1 is about to depart at %2:%3. It will provide ammunition to %4. Try to intercept it. Steal or destroy that truck before it reaches it's destination. Be careful, the enemy may provide an armoured escort.
A convoy from %1 is about to depart at %2:%3. It will reinforce %4 with armored vehicles. Try to intercept it. Steal or destroy the main Armoured Vehicle before it reaches it's destination.

A group of POW's is being transported from %1 to %4, departing at %2:%3. Sadly, it seems the enemy are planning their execution. We must intercept it and rescue them. Kill the driver or capture the truck to make them join you and bring them to HQ.

The enemy have been spotted moving large amounts of money from %1 to %4 departing at %2:%3. Steal that truck and bring it to HQ. There aren't many better opportunities to acquire the funds we will need to build up our army, don't screw up!
A truck with medical supplies is about to depart from %1 to %4 at %2:%3. Steal the truck and bring it to %4 . Let the people there know of the FIA's 'benevolence' .

From what we know, a high-value target will travel from %1 to %4. His departure is scheduled for %2:%3. Seize the opportunity and take him out! We believe he will use a decoy to obscure his exact vehicle.
A QRF has just been spotted taking off from %2. Their initial heading suggests that %1 is their target. We have no choice, assume defensive positions

An opportunity to strike a Radio Tower in %1 presents its self. If we manage this it will interrupt %4 Comms Nework in the AO. We can destroy the antenna or capture the outpost but must complete it before %2:%3.
We have downed air vehicle. This is a great chance to destroy it before it is recovered by a recovery team from %1 reaches the crash site
We know an %4 is stationed in %1. This is a good chance to steal or destroy it before it causes more damage. Do it before %2:%3.

A local politician who is sympathetic to our cause is willing to meet us near %1 until %2:%3. As it happens, he has a couple of jobs he's offering to undermine %4 control in this AO. He has stated that he is willing to speak to us only on the condition that none of our agents are overt within that town. In other words, put on your sunday-best and meet him disguised.

Black Market dealer Devin Connell has been spotted near %1. He's scheduled for a flight to Metavira or Arulco at %2:%3, so you better hurry up if you wish to acquire some of his fine products. From our recent meetings with him, he has agreed to meet with FIA overt soldiers only, apparently he doesnt like civilians all that much.

A disgruntled %4 officer is trying to leave Altis. His departure is scheduled for %2:%3. If you manage to get to him in time, you might be able to convince him to stay and support our case. He was spotted near %1 and has stated that he is willing to speak to us only on the condition that none of our agents are overt within that town. In other words, put on your sunday-best and meet him disguised.
We've spotted an enemy Ammotruck in an %1. This is a great opportunity to scavange some well-needed gear from the enemy. We have until %2:%3.

We know %4 is guarding a large amount of money in the bank of %1. Take this getaway vehicle and go there before %2:%3, hold the truck close to thw bank's main entrance for 2 minutes and the money will be transferred to the truck. Bring it back to HQ and the money will be ours.

We've had word from our informant that a sympathetic cell has sent supplies to %1. They ran into an %5 patrol and the crate felt down from their truck while fleeing. Find and secure the goods, then deliver them to the people in %1 before %2:%3. %5 command has probably dispatched reinforcements from %4 to retrieve the goods, so you better hurry.

%1 population is in need of supplies. Load this box on a car and unload it where the marker indicate you. Keep the area secure for 2 minutes to let the population grab what they need. Do it before %2:%3.

Our Commander has asked %1 for a supply drop. Command the transport with your HC module and bring it to the designated position. Once it has landed you are free to use the equipment or bring it back to HQ. We dont think they will be able to supply us again for some time.

We have noticed that the town of %1 is sympathetic to our cause. Travel there with this Truck and establish a semi-permanent propaganda station in order to spread the word. Once established, stay with and guard the station for as long as you deem necessary to raise town support. It would be wise to expect a number of enemy military responses to this action. You have until %2:%3 to arrive and set it up.
You failed to set up the gear before %2:%3.
Protect the station for as long as you can. We have enough battery capacity to run this station until %2:%3, so don't drag this out.
You held the position for less than 10 minutes.
You managed to hold the position long enough to inspire the population.

Supporters of our cause have been working hard to bring the population of %1 over to our side. Help these brave volunteers by delivering these leaflets to safe drop locations. Pick up will take place at %2:%3, so you better have them in place by then. This might be easier if you manage to remain undetected for as long as possible.
You failed to provide leaflets for our volunteers in %1.
Drop a crate within 20m of the marked position, do this before %2:%3.
Well done. Our volunteers in %1 are now spreading the word.

%4 is rebuilding a radio tower in %1. If we want to keep up the enemy comms breakdown, the work must be stopped. Destroy the repair truck parked nearby or capture the zone. Work will be finished at %2:%3.

A group of POWs is awaiting execution at %1. We must rescue them before %2:%3 and bring them to HQ. It would be wise to avoid using anything explosive in your rescue attempt for fear of collateral damage.
A group of FIA supportes are hidden in a house in %1. We have to get there and find them before %2 does and bring them back to base.
In response to the casualties suffered by the garrison at the %2, %1 are preparing to send reinforcements from %3. They will be ready to roll out within minutes. Try to catch them on the move!
We have received word that the enemy are supressing a community at their local church. If we wipe them out we will surely bring some support to our cause. Go to the location and kill the squad.

The enemy is taking fuel from the civilians to supply their war machine. The truck is leaving from %1 and will return there once it is full. We have a contact who will let us know when the truck is at the fuel station. Destroy the fuel truck or take its control.

Reports have come in that a patrol is being dispatched from the %1 to this location. There will be a CSAT SpecOps ground team in the patrol training them in Forest warfare. We know they are patrolling within approximately 150 meters of this point. Go there and assassinate them. Do this before %2:%3.
Camp %1 was destroyed by hostile forces.
Significant activity is being reported at %2. %1 appear to be preparing a major assault. Get ready.
Sources near %4 report of an imminent attack by %1 and %2 on %3. Setup defences immediatly!
Our Commander asked %5 for an armored column departing from %2 with destination %1. Provide whatever support you can. They are scheduled to leave the AO at %3:%4.
We can only deploy\delete one emplacement at a time.
You need a radio in your inventory to be able to give orders to other squads.
We currently have no roadblocks or watchposts.
You cannot delete an emplacement while there are enemies near it.
Click on the position you wish to build the wachpost or roadblock. \n Remember: to build roadblocks, you must click exactly on a road map section.
You lack of resources to build this emplacement. \n %1 HR and %2€ required.
Click on the watchpost or roadblock you wish to delete.
Only the Commander may move assets.
You need to be on foot and not controlling AI to move assets.
This asset is too far from the zone.
You cannot move assets farther than %1m from the zone.
You have one chance, join us and help us liberate %1 from tyranny!
Okay, thank you. I wasn't expecting this. See you at HQ.
Click on a map position to select your starting location
Close the map with M or ESC to start in the default position
Try not to select areas with nearby enemies\n\nGameplay and difficulty change with different starting locations.
Petros has been killed. You lost part of your assets and need to select a new HQ position.
The selected position is too close to enemy zones, please select another.
You cannot place your HQ in the water. Please select another position.
There are enemies nearby, please select another position.
Please wait while your assets are being moved to the selected location.
You won't lose your stats in the event of a game update.
Vehicles outside of your garage will only be saved if they are within 50m of your HQ flag, with no AI inside.
AI units and squads will not be saved, but you will be reimbursed.
Static weapons need to be within 50m of a friendly flag, and they need to be assembled, otherwise they will not be saved.
Player Commander disconnected or retired. %1 is our new leader. Greet him!
%2 replaced %1 as the leader of our forces. Greet him!
You step down from being Commander. Others will take your place.
You are no longer eligible to command our forces.
You are now eligible to command our forces.
You have less than 100€ to donate.
You have donated 100€ to the cause. This will raise your status among FIA forces.
You must be looking at a player in order to donate money.
Only the Commander has access to this function.
Only an admin has access to this function.
There are not enough funds for you to borrow anything.
You've taken 100€ from the general budget. Invest it wisely.
You are not looking at a player.
The player is already a member on this server.
The player is already not a member on this server.
%1 has been added to this server's members list.
%1 has been removed from this server's members list.
You've cleared the surroundings of trees and bushes.

You are not on the members list of this Server.

Ask the Commander in order to be allowed to access the HQ Ammobox.

In the meantime you may use the other box to store equipment and share it with others.

Arsenal Unlocking Requirements
Weapons: %1
Backpacks: %5
Magazines/Usables: %2
Optics: %3
Vests: %3
Other Items: %4
Imported Items: %6

You are not in the members list of this Server.

Ask the Commander in order to be allowed to access the HQ Ammobox.

In the meantime, you may use the other box to store equipment and share it with others.
You are not in the members list, but you have been added automatically due to your status as admin.
Welcome, %1. You are a guest on this server.
You cannot board another player's private vehicle if you are not in the same group.
You already have an active mission of this type.
I have a mission for you.
I have no destroy missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
Destroy missions require radio towers or enemy cities within 4km of your HQ.
I have no logistics missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
Logistics missions require enemy outposts, cities or banks within 4km of your HQ.
I have no rescue missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
Rescue missions require enemy cities or bases within 4km of your HQ.
I have no contact missions right now.
Contact missions require enemy cities within 4km of your HQ.
I have no contact missions right now.
Contact missions require cities within 4km of your HQ.
I have no convoy missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
Convoy missions require enemy cities within 4km of your HQ, and they must have an idle base in their surroundings.
I have no assassination missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
Assassination missions require enemy cities or outposts within 4km of your HQ.
I have no PR missions for you. Move our HQ closer to the enemy or finish some other missions in order to have better intel.
PR missions require enemy cities within 4km of your HQ.
You can only fast-travel one group at a time.
You cannot fast-travel while you are controlling AI.
This group cannot fast-travel with enemies nearby.
You cannot fast-travel with enemies nearby.
You cannot fast-travel if one of your vehicles is damaged or doesn't have a driver.
You cannot fast-travel to an enemy-controlled zone.
You cannot fast-travel to an area under attack or with enemies in the surrounding.
Click on the zone you want to travel to.
You must click near a camp or HQ.
You cannot disguise yourself while you are controlling AI.
You are not in a civilian vehicle.
The vehicle you are in has been reported to the enemy. Switch to another vehicle or change its plates at HQ to become incognito.
You have been reported in the last 30 minutes and cannot go incognito.
You cannot become incognito with enemies less than %1m from you.
You cannot become incognito while enemies are still on the lookout for you nearby.
You cannot become incognito near bases, outposts, or roadblocks.
You cannot disguise yourself while wearing suspicious-looking gear.\n
You have gotten too close to an enemy facility and have been spotted.
You went far from roads and have been spotted.
Explosives have been spotted on your vehicle.
You left your vehicle and you are still in the wanted list.
You have been made, enemies are on the lookout for you!
Your gear is arousing suspicion, you are no longer incognito.\n
